hero.heading: Our Blog
hero.subheading: Insights, updates, and stories about local businesses, the economy, and the #VocalForLocal movement.

aboutUs.tagline: Connecting Local Businesses with Local Communities
aboutUs.description1: SeaNeB helps MSMEs and local entrepreneurs grow with easy-to-use, zero-commission platforms for meals, promotions, and online shops.
aboutUs.description2: With SeaNeB's #VocalForLocal app, you can easily discover the best offers from nearby businesses, save money on unique deals, and play a vital role in boosting your local market. It's time to make every purchase count for your community.

posts.title: Why Every Local Business Needs a Digital Presence in 2025
posts.excerpt: The way that consumers find and engage with businesses has changed as a result of the digital revolution. The days of relying solely on physical signboards or word of mouth are long gone.
posts.author: SeaNeB Team
posts.image: /images/marketing/Why Every Local Business Needs a Digital Presence.jpg

posts.title: India's MSMEs: Backbone of the Local Economy and Vocal for Local
posts.excerpt: India's MSMEs are crucial to its local economy, driving job creation, innovation, and regional growth. As the backbone of India's economy, these businesses promote the 'Vocal for Local' initiative.
posts.author: SeaNeB Team
posts.image: /images/marketing/India’s MSMEs Backbone of the Local Economy.jpg

posts.title: 5 Ways the Vocal for Local Movement is Strengthening the Economy of India
posts.excerpt: Discover 5 ways the Vocal for Local movement empowers Indian startups, MSMEs, and small businesses to boost the economy of India.

posts.title: Top Business Ideas in Gujarat: How Local Businesses and MSMEs Are Powering Manufacturing Industries
posts.excerpt: Explore top business ideas in Gujarat. See how local businesses and MSMEs drive growth, with key MSME schemes boosting manufacturing industries.
posts.author: SeaNeB Team

posts.title: Top 10 Festivals In India That Celebrate Local Businesses and Culture
posts.excerpt: Festivals in India are arguably the most vibrant reflection of the country's rich cultural heritage. But beyond the rituals, prayers, and celebrations, these festivals play a massive role in supporting local businesses.
posts.author: SeaNeB Team

posts.title: Record-Breaking Diwali 2025: Made in India Products Drive ₹5.4 Trillion Sales
posts.excerpt: The Diwali 2025 festive season has been nothing short of historic for India's economy. With record-breaking sales of ₹5.4 trillion, this year's data confirms a massive shift in consumer behavior.
posts.author: SeaNeB Team

posts.title: What is SeaNeB? A Commission-Free Platform For Local Businesses in India
posts.excerpt: In the digital age, local businesses often struggle to compete with e-commerce giants and large aggregators that charge hefty commissions. Enter SeaNeB – a commission-free platform designed exclusively for local businesses in India.
posts.author: SeaNeB Team

posts.title: Top Updates on Vocal for Local: Highlights from 2025
posts.excerpt: The Vocal for Local movement has gained significant momentum in 2025, transforming from a slogan into a nationwide economic revolution. Explore the key highlights.

posts.title: Rise of Indian MSMEs: How Small Businesses Are Powering the 2025 Economic Boom
posts.excerpt: MSMEs have always been the backbone of the Indian economy, but in 2025, they are taking center stage like never before. Learn how they are driving growth.

posts.title: The Future of Local Commerce in India: Trends to Watch in 2025
posts.excerpt: Local commerce in India is undergoing a rapid transformation. From digital adoption to hyper-local delivery models, here are the trends redefining the market in 2025.
